text: Johnsons Strawberry Farm Airport is a private-use airport located three miles (5 km) northeast of the central business district of Hobart, a city in Lake County, Indiana, United States. This airport is privately owned by Rodney Johnson. == Facilities == Johnsons Strawberry Farm Airport has one runway: * Runway 18/36: 2,000 x 60 ft. (610 x 18 m), Surface: Turf == References == == External links == Category:Airports in Lake County, Indiana
title: Johnsons Strawberry Farm Airport
